title: Fortune Funnel VR
description: Physics-based VR puzzle game with funnels, gravity, and haptic feedback.
shortDesc: Solve dynamic physics puzzles by guiding objects through interactive funnels, ramps, and traps in VR. Fortune Funnel VR blends tactile object handling with puzzle-solving in a uniquely satisfying, immersive environment built for Oculus Quest.
roles: Developed interactive physics-based puzzle systems with real-time object simulation in VR.
Implemented funnel, lever, gravity, and switch mechanics for dynamic puzzle flows.
Built gesture-based object grabbing, throwing, and placement systems using Oculus hand tracking.
Designed modular puzzle templates with increasing complexity, timed triggers, and traps.
Collaborated with design and audio teams to enhance tactile and haptic feedback systems.
Optimized for low-latency, high-accuracy collision handling across complex puzzle objects.
Handled scene streaming, memory pooling, and draw call optimization for smooth Quest performance.

contributions.name: Physics Puzzle Systems
contributions.shortDesc: Designed modular funnel puzzles with interactive logic.
details: Created gravity-based systems where users guide balls through tunnels, ramps, and rotating elements.
Implemented collision logic with gates, launchers, and timed pressure pads.
Allowed player experimentation with cause-effect mechanisms in progressively challenging levels.
Developed reusable puzzle templates using ScriptableObjects and timeline-based triggers.

contributions.name: VR Interaction & Object Handling
contributions.shortDesc: Enabled tactile interaction using VR hands and precision physics.
details: Built systems for grabbing, rotating, and placing puzzle parts using Oculus hand tracking.
Added two-handed manipulation for scaling, alignment, and balance-based actions.
Implemented throw physics with velocity matching and spin impulse.
Used collider feedback and haptics to reinforce successful object placement.

contributions.name: Immersive UX & Visual Feedback
contributions.shortDesc: Enhanced immersion with dynamic feedback and intuitive cues.
details: Created glowing highlights and sound cues for interactive parts and completed objectives.
Implemented particle effects and slow-motion moments for milestone puzzle completions.
Designed environments with depth layering, fog, and ambient lighting for immersion.
Maintained visual clarity and depth perception to support precise interaction.

contributions.name: Performance Optimization
contributions.shortDesc: Ensured high performance and smooth VR experience on Oculus Quest.
details: Used mesh batching, occlusion culling, and dynamic quality switching for stable FPS.
Pooled puzzle parts and interaction objects to minimize memory allocation spikes.
Tested extensively in room-scale and seated VR setups with full rotation tracking.
Packaged scenes with LODs and baked lighting for fast loading and visual consistency.
